meanings: [명사] rescue, [동사] rescue (sb from sth), save (sb from sth)
save a child at the cost of one´s life
sacrifice oneself in an attempt to save a child

vlive.korean: [대본이 떨어지기 일보 직전 대본 구출한 믕지] 아~ 다행이다!
vlive.english: [Meung Ji rescued the script before it fell] That's a relief!

vlive.korean: [3][햄토리 구출 작전...] 제목을 멘붕 사태로 지어도 괜찮지 않을가...
vlive.english: [3] [Ham rescue mission...] I think it would be good to make that the title...

examples.english: She was rescued from a watery grave.
Three people were freed from the wreckage.
She had despaired of ever being rescued alive.

examples.korean: 갇힌 광부들을 구출하기 위해 구조원들이 교대를 해 가며 작업을 했다.
examples.english: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners.

examples.korean: 불타는 승용차 안에서 두 아이가 구출되었다.
examples.english: Two children were rescued from the burning car.
